item.title: How Phil Robertson, Duck Dynasty, and A&E Killed the Gay Moment
item.description: Have you ever seen a moment end? I watched Duck Dynasty once or twice. I don’t get it. That makes me different. Fourteen million people watch the show every week. That’s more than watch any other show on television. Clearly, I’m a little odd, especially among conservatives. That’s okay. I’m used to being weird. I never expected that a reality TV show would stop a “moment.” But that’s exactly what’s happened.
